post.author: Admin
post.title: Freshman Family Donations for State Contest
post.description: Dear Band Families, As we near the end of school and band functions for the year, we are hosting the
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

As we near the end of school and band functions for the year, we are hosting the OMEA State Band Event on April 20-21 including approximately 25 Bands. Concessions will be available in Cafe 2 for all bands, family and friends.

 For this fundraiser to be a continued success benefiting our kids and this great band program, we are asking for each Freshman family to please donate the following based on last name:

A  thru R     Qty of  Twelve,  20 oz. Gatorade/G2

S  thru  Z      24 cans of:     Coke reg & diet, , Sunkist Orange or Sprite  

It will be greatly appreciated if  you would please bring your donation to 4851 Persimmon Lane  starting April 9  and no later than April 17 placing them in or near the container on the front porch.

Any questions I can be reached via call or text at 216-990-0271 or dawnrembowski@att.net.

Thank You in advance for your donation and support,

Keep Smiling,
Dawn Rembowski
